item.title: Hi!
item.dc:creator: Tejal
item.description: Hello hello. I’ve been considering starting a blog for a while now, so this is all very exciting! Here you’ll find random musings, stuff I have learnt, and ideas I have found interesting and funny …
item.content:encoded:
Hello hello. I’ve been considering starting a blog for a while now, so this is all very exciting! Here you’ll find random musings, stuff I have learnt, and ideas I have found interesting and funny and worth sharing with everyone who wishes to pay attention.

Why do I want to create an online blog in the era of Instagram and Twitter, you ask? I grew up reading blogs, and I enjoy the warmth that comes from going back to something nostalgic. Besides, it feels much more connected than a social media account.

Welcome, and thanks for being here.
